fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
European Multi-Stakeholder Forum on Electronic Invoicing, 
legislation regulations on e-invoicing and archiving of fiscal documents
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: individuare e proporre misure atte a favorire l’adozione della fatturazione elettronica da parte di imprese e lavoratori autonomi, preservando l’interoperabilità transfrontaliera dei soggetti che utilizzano la fattura elettronica
